sentence: It was a day for the streetfighters, therefore, so no surprise to see Graeme McDowell shoot 69 to move up 23 places to stand alongside McIlroy, while Matt Fitzpatrick shot 70 to be inside the top ten.
author: Derek Lawrenson Golf Correspondent At Bay Hill
title: DEREK LAWRENSON AT BAY HILL: It has been the year of the underdog at the PGA Tour this season with Talor Gooch and Billy Horschel leading the way, and Rory McIlroy, Viktor Hovland and Brit Tyrrell Hatton struggling to deliver

sentence: It's hard to do justice to how much more difficult it was for players in his half of the draw, but the starry cast list of those who headed home early, cursing their misfortune, tells its own story: Collin Morikawa, Jordan Spieth, Brooks Koepka, Xander Schauffele and Brits Matt Fitzpatrick and Lee Westwood to name just a few.
author: Derek Lawrenson for the Daily Mail
title: Rory McIlroy somehow stays alive at the Players Championship after he is saved by malevolent drama... as Scott Piercy becomes the hapless victim of the unpredictable 17th hole with a quadruple bogey in front of thousands

sentence: +4 View gallery Englishman Ian Poulter (above) has work to do if he is to make it to this year’s Masters With only one player from each group progressing to the weekend knockout stages, Poulter has to get past American Scottie Scheffler, twice a winner this year, and two of his Ryder Cup comrades in Tommy Fleetwood and Matt Fitzpatrick.
author: Derek Lawrenson for the Daily Mail
title: Ian Poulter is praying for one more match play miracle to qualify for his 17th Masters next month... with the Englishman needing to jump 17 places in the world rankings into the top 50

sentence: Over the next three days, he plays European members Ian Poulter, Tommy Fleetwood and Matt Fitzpatrick.
